AI Description: spdlog is a header-only, feature-rich, and highly performant logging library for C++ which provides various logging outputs and log levels.
Core Features: Header-Only Library For Easy Integration, Supports Various Logging Outputs Like Console, File, Rotating File, Etc., Configurable Log Levels For Filtering Log Messages, Fast & Efficient Logging With Minimal Overhead, Thread-Safe Logging For Multithreaded Applications
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
